pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Compressed Neural Networks for R // The FCNN4R package provides an interface to kernel routines from the FCNN C++ library. FCNN is based on a completely new Artificial Neural Network representation that offers unmatched efficiency, modularity, and extensibility. FCNN4R provides standard teaching (backpropagation, Rprop) and pruning algorithms (minimum magnitude, Optimal Brain Surgeon), but it is first and foremost an efficient computational engine. Users can easily implement their algorithms by taking advantage of fast gradient computing routines, as well as network reconstruction functionality (removing weights and redundant neurons).
